summary: The diff updates the footer phone number as requested, but also modifies unrelated files (including backend/main.mo and project_state.json) that were not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor file modified even though the request was only to update the footer phone number (a frontend-only change).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is updating the footer phone number and explicitly includes a non-goal of not changing other areas; no backend changes were requested or implied.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updated to include multiple features/REQ IDs unrelated to the requested footer phone number update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest lists Requirements: none and only asks for a footer phone number update; updating feature tracking/state content is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend file summaries index modified (documentation/metadata) without being requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating any documentation/summary files; only the footer phone number was in scope.
